headline: Want to Invest in Nvidia’s Futuristic Rubin Chips? Consider This 1 ‘Picks-and-Shovels’ Stock Instead.
summary: Wells Fargo believes Monolithic Power could benefit as Nvidia’s Rubin scales, making it a subtle picks-and-shovels play.

headline: 2 Cash-Producing Stocks for Long-Term Investors and 1 That Underwhelm
summary: A company that generates cash isn’t automatically a winner. Some businesses stockpile cash but fail to reinvest wisely, limiting their ability to expand.
